text: Chiron is a creature from Greek mythology. He is a centaur, a creature with a horse's body and a man's chest, arms and head where the horse's head would be. Chiron was a respected centaur because of his kindness and intelligence. ==Other websites== *Theoi Project - Kentauros Kheiron Category:Greek mythology af:Chiron az:Xiron bs:Hiron br:C'heiron bg:Хирон ca:Quiró cs:Cheirón da:Chiron de:Cheiron en:Chiron et:Cheiron el:Χείρων es:Quirón eo:Kirono eu:Kiron fa:کیرون fr:Chiron (mythologie) ko:케이론 hr:Hiron id:Kheiron it:Chirone he:כיירון ka:ქირონი lt:Cheironas hu:Kheirón nl:Cheiron ja:ケイローン no:Cheiron pl:Chiron (mitologia) pt:Quíron ro:Chiron ru:Хирон sr:Хирон sh:Hiron fi:Kheiron sv:Keiron tr:Chiron uk:Хірон zh:喀戎
title: Chiron
